chara.textHome: Momoko Togame here!
I go to school in Kamihama City.

I grew up between two brothers,
so...well, as you can see,
I'm kinda...on the rougher side?

Well, anyway, I got real good at sports,
so it's got its perks goin' for it.
As for things I like, um...w-well, pop stars...
It's thanks to everyone else I got this far.
So I wanna use this power to help 'em back!
I can keep on fightin' for you all!

Ain't no way I'm stoppin' here!
I can keep runnin', just watch!

Woohoo!
I gotta go test out this new strength,
right away!

I'm not alone anymore.
I got everyone watchin' my back...
so I gotta keep gettin' tougher.
I wanna protect everyone, after all!

Obviously I wanna get stronger so
I can protect those dear to me,
like my family and friends!

Hey, if it wound up helpin' me
grow as a Magical Girl...

I guess it ain't so bad bein'
boyish and strong!
I've been waitin' for you!
All right, let's make today the best it can be!

Oh! You gotta tell me the rest of that story
you were telling me yesterday!
Mornin'! What's up?
You seem kinda down.

I'm always here if you wanna talk
about what's on your mind.
Just let me know.
I am literally starvin' right now...

"Can't do anythin' on an empty stomach."
Isn't that what they say?
Come on, let's go get some lunch.
Time to learn the moves for that new song!

Feel free to join in if you like!
This one looks pretty easy to learn!
Mmph...ph...
I always get sleepy around this time…

Maybe I overexerted myself
a bit during the day...Zzz...
Hmmm? Did I lend that DVD to Rena?

Hey, do you remember me sayin' somethin'
about lending that DVD to Rena?
Ready? I can leave any time.

We've gotta treat ourselves after
working so hard!
Let's go to a café whenever you're ready!

Well they asked for it!
Let's do this!

I mean, I do have the strongest team
backin' me up!
No way we'll lose!
This stuffed animal?
Um...
I just...found it lyin' around...I mean...

I guess a cute toy like this...doesn't 
really suit me at all, does it?
It's important to respect your elders, okay?
They all have way more experience than us.

It's all about live performances when
it comes to pop music!
No two concerts are alike, ya see.

The atmosphere at those shows...
It's addictive!
Nnghh?! Wh-what?!
Comin' at me all of a sudden...
You scared me...
Sure, Rena can be a bit scary at first.
But deep down, she's a good kid.
I actually really like her stubbornness.
Compared to Rena, Kaede is super gentle.
They're the perfect combo!

A truly balanced team. You wouldn't think it,
but we all work together great!
Yachiyo's pretty amazin'.
I mean, she's a professional model!

She always talks to you so normally,
but when you see her in magazines,
it's like, "Whoa!"

I wished for the courage to tell the boy I liked
how I felt about him,
but he already had a girlfriend...
Ironic, huh?

There's a reason they call me
Bad-Timing-Momoko.
Okay, okay, okay, okay!
I get it, all right?!
Just calm down for a sec!
What's gotten into you?
Everyone relax!
Neat and clean, just the way I like it!
It's all about team work, right?

I'm countin' on you to back
me up from here on!

All of us are here! It was bound to
turn out like this.
Momoko Togame reportin' for duty!
Heh, just kiddin' around!

I've already got a team with some friends
who are Magical Girls.
Feel free to join up if ya like!
Man, I'm turnin' into a really buff girl...
Oh, but, I'm happy about it!

Maybe this is the result of keepin' up
good habits!
Glad I put in all that effort!
I feel real tough right now!

I think we stand a chance at bein'
the strongest team around someday!

Now that I'm here, I don't have a single
regret about becomin' a Magical Girl.

Y'know why? 'Cause if I hadn't become a
Magical Girl, I wouldn't have met everybody.

If I was alone...my heart woulda been
broken a long time ago.

But I pulled myself up,
thanks to everyone stickin' by me.
Heh...kinda sappy, right?
